summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Governance V2 API (Amendment Studio) - All core features working correctly with proper immutability enforcement and hash chain integrity
passed_tests: V2 API - Create Record with draft v1 (POST /api/governance/v2/records)
V2 API - Get Record with current revision (GET /api/governance/v2/records/:id)
V2 API - IMMUTABILITY TEST - PATCH on finalized revision returns 409 (CRITICAL)
V2 API - Update draft amendment succeeds (PATCH /api/governance/v2/revisions/:id)
V2 API - Soft delete with reason (POST /api/governance/v2/records/:id/void)
V2 API - Get audit log entries (GET /api/governance/v2/records/:id/events)
V2 API - Hash chain integrity verification (content_hash includes parent_hash)
Full Amendment Studio workflow: create → finalize → attempt edit (409) → amend → edit amendment → finalize
All legacy governance modules (meetings, distributions, disputes, insurance, compensation)
